extendedIngredients.name: reduced-fat shredded mexican cheese blend
extendedIngredients.originalString: 1/4 cup reduced fat Mexican blend cheese

extendedIngredients.name: skinless boneless chicken breasts
extendedIngredients.originalString: 4 ounces cooked, shredded boneless skinless chicken breasts

extendedIngredients.name: wonton wrappers
extendedIngredients.originalString: 8 wonton wrappers (these can be found in the refrigerated produce section by the Asian products)
metaInformation: (these can be found in the produce section by the Asian products)

recipes.title: Chicken Verde Wonton Tacos

winePairing.pairingText: Chardonnay, Pinot Noir, and Sauvignon Blanc are my top picks for Chicken. White meat is typically paired with white wine as to not overpower the flavor of the meat, so chardonnay and sauvignon blanc are safe choices. Chicken prepared with a tomato sauce or certainly a red wine sauce can and should be served with a red like a pinot noir. The NV Mindbender Chardonnay with a 4.4 out of 5 star rating seems like a good match. It costs about 12 dollars per bottle.

productMatches.title: NV Mindbender Chardonnay
productMatches.description: Lightly Oaked, the Mindbender Chardonnay is a sophisticated style of Chardonnay, that is full of the best elements of this classic grape varietal. The aromatics are complex and welcoming with floral and citrus tones mixed with hints of honeysuckle and butterscotch. The good percentage of oak aging brings a lovely vanilla note. The Mindbender Chardonnay is here to make you see Chardonnay in a new and innovative way. The Mindbender Chardonnay is a sophisticated style of Chardonnay, that is full of the best elements of this classic grape varietal. Visually it is golden straw in color. The aromatics are complex and welcoming with floral and citrus tones mixed with hints of honeysuckle and butterscotch. The well-rounded flavors carry the butterscotch throughout lending a smooth, creamy aspect while the citrus flavors bring freshness and brightness to the body. The good percentage of oak aging brings a lovely vanilla note. The finish is rounded out with a depth of ripe fruit flavors such as apricots, melons and peaches with a spritz of lime.

recipes.instructions: Preheat oven to 400 degrees and line a baking sheet with parchment paper.In a small bowl mix the chicken, salsa, sour cream, chili powder, garlic powder, cumin and green onions.Place the wonton wrappers on the baking sheet and place about 1 Tablespoon of the mixture on each wonton.Divide and sprinkle cheese evenly over the mixture on each wonton.Bring two of the opposing corners up and using a little water stick them together.Bake for 4-5 minutes or until wontons get crispy. Be careful because they will burn if you don't watch them.Top with cilantro and avocado if desired.

steps.step: Preheat oven to 400 degrees and line a baking sheet with parchment paper.In a small bowl mix the chicken, salsa, sour cream, chili powder, garlic powder, cumin and green onions.

Place the wonton wrappers on the baking sheet and place about 1 Tablespoon of the mixture on each wonton.Divide and sprinkle cheese evenly over the mixture on each wonton.Bring two of the opposing corners up and using a little water stick them together.
Bake for 4-5 minutes or until wontons get crispy. Be careful because they will burn if you don't watch them.Top with cilantro and avocado if desired.
